HediffDef.label: void drain
HediffDef.description: Psychic coma caused by multiple skip gates and the archites that support them. Until the source is destroyed, the coma will not end.

HediffDef.label: maneater nutritions
HediffDef.description: The nutrients absorbed by archites will significantly reduce the consumption of nutrients in the body.

HediffDef.label: chimera mark
HediffDef.description: Archite virus implanted with a chimera subgene. It slowly collects the host's genetic information. After the host dies, the virus sends the accumulated genes via a psychic link with the caster. The effectiveness of this virus directly depends on the caster's psychic sensitivity. It is harmless to the host.
